## Table of Contents

### Classes

* [`hosts`](#hosts): Manage `/etc/hosts`

## Classes

### <a name="hosts"></a>`hosts`

Manage `/etc/hosts`

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include hosts
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `hosts` class:

* [`target`](#target)
* [`hosts`](#hosts)

##### <a name="target"></a>`target`

Data type: `Stdlib::Absolutepath`

The path to the hosts file

Default value: `'/etc/hosts'`

##### <a name="hosts"></a>`hosts`

Data type: `Hash`

Hash of host resource entries

Default value: `{}`
